name: Unruly Beams
description:
Goal

Your goal is to shoot as many ennemies as possible. You have four laser guns at your disposal, one for each side of your ship. You must rotate your ship in the right direction at the right time to succeed.

Be careful: if you loose one of your weapons, your core gets exposed!

Controls

Move using WASD/arrow keys and rotate using the mouse.
You have no control over your weapon: it shoots randomly in four directions.

The guns lights up right before it shoots so you can rotate at the right time.
